name: Astrava
description: What is the project about? Astrava is a groundbreaking platform that revolutionizes the Web3 creative landscape by combining decentralized streaming capabilities with a unique reward swap mechanism. Astrava aims to empower Web3 creatives, foster community building, and facilitate knowledge sharing. With its innovative features and sustainable tokenomics, Astrava provides an immersive environment where creators can express themselves, build a supportive community, and earn rewards. This whitepaper outlines Astrava's core features, token distribution, and roadmap, paving the way for its seamless integration and adoption.
